tika.dc.description:
Trouble in paradise. That's what Archaeologist, Jordan Pryde finds herself in when she is summoned from her comfortable New Mexico campus to the middle of the South Pacific just days before a nuclear test. A team of Greenpeace divers have perished, with them, one of Jordan's former colleagues who sent out a distress signal before he died. The signal, intercepted by a team of Navy SEALS and the close-by French Foreign Legion converge on the scene in a race against time as the SEALS and Jordan fight to uncover the secret below the ocean while the French scramble to keep it hidden.
Will they find the answers and make it out before the blast?
